div.head: 玉莖不痿
div.div: failure of the jade stalk to return to dysfunction

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

entry.def: failure of the jade stalk to return to dysfunction

sense.def: Illness Sign of male adults with an erection persisting over a long time without returning to a normal condition, associated with an uncomfortable feeling. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry bu gu zhi 補骨脂 quotes Zhi qi ji fang 治奇疾方 : 玉莖不痿：精滑無歇，時時如針刺，捏之則 脆，此名腎漏 , “When the jade stalk fails to return to dysfunction : unceasing smooth flow of essence/semen, often accompanied by a feeling as if pierced with a needle. When pinched it feels crisp. This is called ‘kidney leakage’”.
